import React,{useEffect} from 'react' import { useDispatch,useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Carousel,Image } from 'react-bootstrap' import Loader from './Loader' import Message from './Message' import { listTopProducts } from '../actions/productActions' import { NumberFormat } from '../screens/NumberFormat' function ProductCarousel() { const dispatch =useDispatch() const productTopRated=useSelector(state=>state.productTopRated) const {error,loading,products}=productTopRated useEffect(()=> { dispatch(listTopProducts()) },[dispatch]) return (loading ? : error ?{error} :( {products.map(product =>(

{product.name} (NumberFormat{product.price})

 ))} ) ) } export default ProductCarousel
